text: I want to write a server that can accept multiple clients in python (twisted).
I am already quite familiar with socket programming with the standard python socket module but here comes the trouble..
I think twisted is really hard to get into and i have read some tutorials about it.
But a thing that i can't really find is a simple socket server that accepts multiple connections.. Can anyone help?
If i missed some valuable information online please let me know because i am pulling my hair out..
